featured.text: Then, the tortoise carries the hare and swims to the 38 bank of the river.
George at first had difficulty swimming across the pool, but he finally succeeded on his fourth .
This time, the tortoise wins the race because the hare cannot swim.
And if a flashlight fish is threatened by a predator, it swims away in a zigzag path, flashing its light on and off very quickly to confuse the animal pursuing it.

other.text: Michael Phelps, an American swimmer, broke seven world records and won eight gold medals in men’s swimming _____ in the 2008 Olympics.

definition.zh_def: 游泳，指在水中用四肢移動的運動。
definition.en_def: To move through water by using the arms and legs.
definition.example: I love to swim in the ocean during the summer.
